products.name: Promotor® 960 Real Time PCR System
products.caption: The 960 Real-Time PCR System enables you to perform real-time, onboard PCR amplification, reverse transcription-PCR, fluorescence detection, and data analysis. After monitoring fluorescence during nucleic acid amplification, results can be analyzed.
products.description: The 960 Real-Time PCR System enables you to perform real-time, onboard PCR amplification, reverse transcription-PCR, fluorescence detection, and data analysis. After monitoring fluorescence during nucleic acid amplification, results can be analyzed.
bullet_points: Detection of 1 copy of template in a 50 μL reaction
No need for ROX reference dye
No crosstalk between well to well due to special optical system design

tableRows.specifications: Channel 1: FAM, SYBR Green,Channel 2: VIC, HEX, JOE, TET,Channel 3: ROX, Texas Red; Channel 4: CY5
Additional dyes within the wavelength range compatible with the filters are supported
Standard optical 0.2 mL 96-well plates (Semi-skirted, Non-skirted),8-strip 0.2 mL tubes,0.2 mL optical tubes
Detection of 1 copy of template in a 50 μL reaction
Comparative Ct,Standard Curve,Relative Standard Curve,Allelic Discrimination

products.name: ACON® SARS-CoV-2 IgG/IgM Rapid Test
products.caption: The SARS-CoV-2 IgG/IgM Rapid Test is a lateral flow chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of antibodies (IgG and IgM) to SARS-CoV-2 in human serum, plasma, or whole blood.
products.description: The SARS-CoV-2 IgG/IgM Rapid Test is a lateral flow chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of antibodies (IgG and IgM) to SARS-CoV-2 in human serum, plasma, or whole blood.

products.name: Promotor® NES-32 Nucleic Acid Extraction Kit
products.caption: The semi-automatic NES-32 nucleic acid extraction system is efficient, easy to operate and offers a throughput of 32 samples per run
products.description: The semi-automatic NES-32 nucleic acid extraction system is efficient, easy to operate and offers a throughput of 32 samples per run. Using magnetic bead technology, the NES-32 can process a variety of specimens, including tissue, blood and other bodily fluids.
bullet_points: Specimens include: Serum, plasma, swab and sputum
The 32 test kit includes 2 Extraction Plates,4 Tip Combs,1 x 700 µL Proteinase K,1 x 700 µL Carrier RNA

bullet_points: Specimens include: Serum, plasma, swab, feces and urine

products.name: SARS-CoV-2 RT-PCR Test Kit
products.caption: Qualitative detection of nucleic acid from SARS-CoV-2 in oropharyngeal swab, nasopharyngeal swab and deepcough sputum specimens collected from individuals suspected of SARS-CoV-2 by their healthcare provider
products.description: Qualitative detection of nucleic acid from SARS-CoV-2 in oropharyngeal swab, nasopharyngeal swab and deep cough sputum specimens collected from individuals suspected of SARS-CoV-2 by their healthcare provider.Clinical correlation with patient history and other diagnostic information is necessary to determine patient infection status.
bullet_points: Specimens include Oropharyngeal and nasopharyngeal swabs, and deep cough sputum specimens
Qualitative detection of nucleic acids from SARS-CoV-2
Full-process controls with negative, positive and internal controls

tableRows.specifications: Real-Time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR)
Oropharyngeal swab, nasopharyngeal swab and deep cough sputum

products.name: Promotor® HBV Quantitative PCR Test Kit(Real time)
products.caption: This real-time PCR test kit is for quantitative determination of the hepatitis B virus in HBV-infected individuals. With a high sensitivity of 20 IU/mL.
products.description: This real-time PCR test kit is for quantitative determination of the hepatitis B virus in HBV-infected individuals. With a high sensitivity of 20 IU/mL, this test kit is an excellent choice for HBV infection diagnosis, treatment decision making and viral load monitoring during antiviral therapy.
bullet_points: Internal quality control: prevents false-negative results
Specificity: no cross-reactivity with HAV, HCV, HEV and HIV

products.name: Promotor® HCV Quantitative PCR Test Kit
products.caption: This real-time PCR test kit is for quantitative determination of the hepatitis C virus in HCV-infected individuals. With a high sensitivity of 30 IU/mL.
products.description: This real-time PCR test kit is for quantitative determination of the hepatitis C virus in HCV-infected individuals. With a high sensitivity of 30 IU/mL, this test kit is an excellent choice for HCV infection diagnosis, treatment decision making and viral load monitoring during antiviral therapy.
bullet_points: Internal quality control: prevents false-negative results
Specificity: no cross-reactivity with HAV, HBV, HEV and HIV

products.name: HPV 16/18 Genotype PCR Test Kit
products.caption: This real-time PCR test kit is for qualitative detection of HPV types 16 and 18 (high-risk types) in cervical specimens.
products.description: Human papillomavirus types 16 and 18 (high-risk types) are responsible for about 70% of all cervical cancer cases worldwide. This real-time PCR test kit is for qualitative detection of HPV types 16 and 18 in cervical specimens. It can be used alongside other cervical cancer screening or diagnostic methods, contributing to more accurate medical information and better treatment decisions. It can also be used during physical examinations to identify high-risk HPV infections.
bullet_points: Specificity: no cross-reactivity with CT, UU, NG and other types of HPV
Less or equal to 30 min. extraction and 1-hour PCR (extraction reagent included)

products.name: TB PCR Test Kit(Real time)
products.caption: This real-time PCR test kit is for qualitative detection of Mycobacterium tuberculosis viral DNA in human sputum specimens.
products.description: This real-time PCR test kit is for qualitative detection of Mycobacterium tuberculosis bacterial DNA in human sputum specimens. It can be used alongside other diagnostic methods, contributing to the final diagnosis of TB infection.
bullet_points: Specificity: no cross-reactivity with UU, MP and CP
Less or equal to 30 min. extraction and 1-hour PCR (extraction reagent included)

products.name: HLA-B27 PCR Test Kit(Real Time)
products.caption: HLA-B27 is strongly associated with ankylosing spondylitis (AS) and other related inflammatory diseases, such as psoriasis, inflammatory bowel disease and reactive arthritis.
products.description: This real-time PCR test kit is for the detection of Human leukocyte antigen B27 in whole blood. HLA-B27 is strongly associated with ankylosing spondylitis (AS) and other related inflammatory diseases, such as psoriasis, inflammatory bowel disease and reactive arthritis. Testing for HLA-B27 can aid in early diagnosis and management of these conditions.
bullet_points: Specificity: no cross-reactivity with other subtypes of HLA gene
Internal quality control: prevents false-negative results
Less or equal to 30 min. extraction and 1-hour PCR (extraction reagent included)

products.name: HPV 18 High-risk Types with 16/18 Genotyping Test Kit
products.caption: This real-time PCR kit determines the presence of HPV 16 and HPV 18 in cervical specimens, with results that differentiate between the two, and simultaneously screens for 16 other high-risk genotypes.
products.description: This PCR test kit is for the qualitative detection of 18 high-risk HPV types in cervical specimens. The test utilizes PCR technology to amplify target DNA and determine the presence of each viral type. Up to three test results are obtained per patient sample and provide the following information Specifically distinguish between the presence of HPV 16 and HPV 18 Screen for the presence of high-risk types: HPV 26, 31, 33, 35, 39, 45, 51, 52 53, 56, 58, 59, 66, 68, 73, 82 with one qualitative result The kit can be used in conjunction with clinical information derived from other diagnostic and screening tests, physical examinations and professional guidelines to guide patient management.
bullet_points: Determine the presence of 18 high-risk HPV types

Concordance:Demonstrated 98.5% relative sensitivity, 98.38% relative specificity, and 98.44% relative accuracy, when compared with a commercial PCR-reverse dot blot hybridization assay for the same viral types.Comparisons of only HPV 16 and HPV 18 demonstrated (respectively) sensitivity of 98.46% and 96.3%, specificity of 99.84% and 100%, and accuracy of 99.72% and 99.86%

Time to result Amplification/detection in 45 minutes; total time to result about 1.5 – 1.75 hours (including hands-on prep time, extraction and amplification/detection) Kit includes extraction reagent.

Specificity:No cross-reactivity with certain low-risk genotypes, including HPV 6, 11, 81, 61, 67, 69, 71, 40, 42, 43, 44, 83, 54, 72 or certain viruses and microorganisms, including HSV-Ⅱ, UU, NG, CT, CMV, EB, TP, TV, MH and CAL

products.name: Mission® Cholesterol
products.caption: The Mission® Cholesterol system is a novel, handheld point-of- care device that generates rapid lipid panel test results.
products.description: The Mission® Cholesterol system is a novel, handheld point-of- care device that generates rapid lipid panel test results.
bullet_points: Sample types: whole blood, serum, plasma
3 simple steps: insert strip, apply sample with a capillary transfer tube, read results
Enhanced memory, stores up to 200 results

tableRows.specifications: Total Cholesterol (CHOL),High-Density Lipoprotein (HDL),Triglycerides (TRIG),Calculated Low-Density Lipoprotein (LDL),CHOL/HDL ratio
Capillary or Venous Whole Blood, Serum or Plasma
